reviews.review: The best game ever.Makes your logic work and the characters and story are just the best.Love it.
Una obra maestra en todo el sentido de la palabra. Un juego √∫nico, perfecto.
It's a really fun puzzle game and I'm sad I didn't start playing it earlier.
Nice Game. Must Add to the library !!!

coooooooooooooooooooooooooooolllllllll
das ansere commindty will ich spielen es ist noch nicht drausen

Portal 2, aparte de ser un cl√°sico, es totalmente divertido y recomendable. Las pruebas imponen retos interesantes sin exagerar de la dificultad. Tambi√©n jugar con un amigo es divertido, porque a pesar de que las pruebas est√°n hechas para apoyarse, muchas veces se encontraran riendo por sabotear el trabajo del otro.

Me fascina la mecanica del juego, y el coop player, es genial que tenga editor de mapas, aunque es tardado crear un mapa lo que encuentras de comunidad es calidad pura yo encontr√© un mapa en 4d fue incre√≠ble.
It's probably the best puzzle game ever
If you see a blue circle irl, dont walk into it! i learned the hard way
I really enjoyed this game, and suggest it for anyone that enjoys puzzle games, or just an incredible plot line. The developers of this game really new what they were doing
portal 2 is an amazing game i would highly recommend playing it
All out the best valve game, if you don't play the first game the story will be kind of meh but aside from that its still an amazing game.

This game needs to be re-released in VR.
It's better and longer than portal 1 but the puzzles are quite a bit easier. Good game and still relevant 10 years later
GOD! I REALLY REALLY REALLY WISH THEY WOULD MAKE A PORTAL 3!!
Before you buy: This is a game but 2
Great game, great story, make sure you play the first one first though!
I know I don't have that many hours of playing this game but I've played it on the PS3 almost my whole life so. It's pretty good get it
Gostei quando vc bota um portal em cima e um embaixo e vc acaba vomitando kkkkk
Amazing puzzle game with an attaching story that will make you want to replay it over and over.
Would highly reccomend to anyone as a first steam game. This game was a classic back when I was a kid and I think that anyone who gets a steam account must play it at least once.
Very good puzzle game but can be frustrating sometimes. DEFINITELY buy portal 1 first for the story.

"hello my humans... 

i would like to tell you you will never get that update at all.. 

you know that  i love you... 

we've had some fun
oh you and i. 

you have some problems.

i know that you hate me...

tell the devs to please update the game
for you and i."
